## E<EPIC_ID> – <Epic Title>
<!-- High-level feature grouping -->

### US<EPIC_ID>.<STORY_ID>: <User Story Title>
As a <user role>, I want to <clearly defined action>, so that <measurable benefit>.

---

### Task Breakdown
<!-- Tasks should be small, implementation-focused, and traceable -->
- [ ] TSK<EPIC_ID>.<STORY_ID>.01 – <Atomic, implementable task>
- [ ] TSK<EPIC_ID>.<STORY_ID>.02 – <Atomic, implementable task>
- [ ] TSK<EPIC_ID>.<STORY_ID>.03 – <Atomic, implementable task>

---

### User Acceptance Flow
<!-- Describe the happy path from the user’s perspective -->
1. User <explicit action>.
2. The system <observable response>.
3. The user <next action>.
4. The system <observable response>.
5. The user <achieves goal>.

---

### Acceptance Criteria
<!-- Each criterion must be objectively verifiable -->
- [ ] <Given / When / Then style condition>
- [ ] <Functional requirement that can be tested>
- [ ] <Edge or state condition if applicable>

---

### Definition of Done
<!-- All must be satisfied for the story to be complete -->
- [ ] Acceptance criteria are met
- [ ] Tasks are completed and merged
- [ ] Relevant tests are added or updated
- [ ] Code reviewed and documented if required
